title: The Quigmans: Tunnel of Just Friends
description: The Quigmans, drawn from the depths of Buddy Hickerson's fertile imagination, collects the best of his nationally syndicated single-panel cartoons. Starring Bob (a man whose self-esteem is so low he once took a job as a speed bumb), Francine (Bob's bizarre romantic interest), and Jowles (a beady-eyed hound who disapproves of his role as "pet"), The Quigmans is syndicated in 80 papers nationwide.
author: Buddy Hickerson
